column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We also employ full-time chefs whose one and only job is to oversee the production of our broths. In addition
column2: these broth chefs use specialized Refractometers to check the thickness and consistency of the broth during each preparation. If a batch fails to meet standards
column3: we don't serve it. Of course
column4: I fully understand that taste is subjective and that we will never be all things to all people.
